channel.title: Panel Discussion on HKUST Tech Club

item.title: #7: Panel Discussion (Hack for Hackathons)
item.description: Date and Venue The seventh meeting - Panel Discussion (Hack for Hackathons) was held on 2018-04-13 at 7pm. The meeting venue was CSE lounge and it is located at lift 25-26, 3rd floor. Summary Thank you so much to everyone who came to the meetup last Friday! And huge applause to our wonderful panelists: Peter Chung Kenta Iwasaki Felicia Agatha Isaac Zachary To 李婷婷 We got some meaningful insights about how to gain most out of hackathons and learnt about some of the winning strategies.
